info.title: renshuu API
info.description: API for registered users to access and adjust dictionary and personal data from renshuu. API key can be found in the settings panel of renshuu. Discussion on this API is https://www.renshuu.org/forums/topics/11824/Interested_in_working_with_a_renshuu_API%3F

description.example: Words picked up from living in Japan

japanese.example: カオちゃんは可愛いです。

hiragana.example: カオちゃんはかわいいです。

rolling_week_count.description: New terms learned in the last 7 days

example.en: Both actions [A] and [B] are occuring at the same time. Emphasis is placed on the second action ([B]) in the sentence.

japanese.example: 本を__読みながら__彼女を待ちます。

hiragana.example: ほん　を　__よみながら__　かのじょ　を　まちます　。

example.en: I __wait for her while__ I read a book.

construct.description: Image of construction pattern(s), suitable for discord embeds

kunyomi.example: た (べる) (小), く (う) (小), く (らう) (高), は (む) (x)

example: this way, this direction (direction close to the speaker or towards the speaker)
here (place close to the speaker or where the speaker is)
this (one) (something physically close to the speaker)
this person (someone physically close to the speaker and of equal or higher status)

today_all.description: Number of terms (of all types) studied today

get.summary: Search renshuu's example sentences for a specific word
get.description: Returns example sentences for that word

delete.summary: Remove grammar from schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to remove from

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to remove from

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule did not contain this grammar.

put.summary: Add grammar to schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to add to

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to add to

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule already contained this grammar.

delete.summary: Remove kanji from schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to remove from

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to remove from

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule did not contain this kanji.

put.summary: Add kanji to schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to add to

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to add to

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule already contained this kanji.

delete.summary: Remove word from schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to remove from

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to remove from

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule did not contain this word.

put.summary: Add word to schedule or list

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list to add to

parameters.name: sched_id
parameters.description: The ID of the schedule to add to

404.description: List or schedule could not be found.

409.description: List or schedule already contained this word.

get.summary: Lookup word based on word's id
List of all user schedule specified by Id
List of terms in the user schedule specified by id
List of all lists made by user, grouped by termtype and groups
List of all terms in the specified user list
List of all terms of that type studied by the user
